name: Link()
description:
Link is a 2D endless action game where the player links nodes to hack the network and upload viruses and malware, while being thwarted by the anti-viruses and even other neutral enemies. Levels get harder as the player progresses, and more enemies are spawned to stop the player.

Controls

  • WASD - movement
  • Left click - click on a node to teleport to it
  • Right click / Spacebar - ping to hack a node / destroy enemies

Link is currently in development, with a few more features to possibly come, if there's an interest to the game!

List of features to be added:

  1. More enemy types.
  2. High-score (points + time survived).
  3. Background sprites.
  4. Possible custom level designs, e.g. different shapes(e.g. circle, triangle) , letters, etc.

Do give us some feedback with the current state of the game, and if there is potential enough to develop it way way further than the suggested features mentioned through comments or email (ian.gamedev@arukigroup.com)!
